author: Luiz Othero
description:
Waterproof spray 

Believe we can use a waterproofing spray of PPE parts that become more exposed, for example, at the junction of the gloves, boots and other joints. There are sprays on the market that can be used directly on the skin, into parts that can be considered at risk. (Liquid Bandage)
